thread.title: Tom Daley had '18-month fling with male model behind fiance's back' | Metro News
thread.title_full: Tom Daley had '18-month fling with male model behind fiance's back' | Metro News

author: Olivia Waring For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Tom Daley had '18-month fling with male model behind fiance's back' | Metro News
text:
Search Metro Follow us Tom Daley had ’18-month fling with 6ft 6in male model behind the back of fiance Dustin Lance Black’ Olivia Waring for Metro.co.uk Sunday 19 Feb 2017 9:38 am Tom Daley, left, is accused of having an affair with Ed William, right, behind the back of his fiance Dustin Lance Black, centre (Pictures: Getty/Instagram) 
Olympic diver Tom Daley had a lengthy affair with a male model while his filmmaker husband Dustin Lance Black was away working, according to reports. Sponsored 13 realities of going wedding dress shopping 
For a period of 18 months, it’s claimed the 22-year-old athlete exchanged sexually-explicit messages with 6′ 6″ model Edward William, 27, before their relationship developed — becoming ‘purely physical’. 
It’s alleged Tom and Edward first met through friends in 2014 but didn’t take their relationship to the next level until Dustin, 42, was out of the country months later. Tom has a ‘huge sex drive’, according to a source (Picture: Getty) 
After going to a barbecue at Tom and Dustin’s flat, it’s claimed Edward came round for coffee numerous times to see them both. 
But between 2014 and 2015, Edward started coming round to see Tom while his partner was absent, a source claims. A post shared by Edward William (@edwardwilliamb) on Jul 16, 2016 at 4:47am PDT 
The source told The Sun : ‘Ed said the messages Tom sent would say things like, “I’m home and horny, can you come round?” 
‘Others would say, “Lance is away, are you going to be about?” A post shared by Edward William (@edwardwilliamb) on Feb 7, 2016 at 4:10am PST More
